text:
Hi, Is there anyway i can provide a local directory to my HubSpot extensions folder to run the extension directly from my root folder of monorepo.
Like i will provide path like `"dev:HubSpotapp": "cd ./apps/HubSpotapp/src/app/extensions && hs project dev"` in my main package.json file which i can just run yarn dev:HubSpotapp.
Is this kind of feature available from HubSpot cli?
